    • Class visualisingCellularAutomata.InitialPopup extends javax.swing.JDialog implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:

      • Serialized Fields

        • buttonGroup
          javax.swing.ButtonGroup buttonGroup
          Button group for radio buttons.
        • contentPanel
          javax.swing.JPanel contentPanel

    • Class visualisingCellularAutomata.LifePanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      -5216611180689834553L

      • Serialized Fields

        • gridColor
          java.awt.Color gridColor
          The colour of the gridlines.
        • lifeArray
          Cell[][] lifeArray
          Stores the grid of cells. This grid is displayed graphically.
        • pixelColor
          java.awt.Color pixelColor
          Default colours for the grid and cells to be drawn (Grey and White). Can't be changed by the user (in this version).
        • pixelSize
          int pixelSize
          The size in pixels of each cell (square).
        • postLifeArray
          Cell[][] postLifeArray
          Uses lifeArray to generate the next generation of cells, which are stored in this array.
        • xSize
          int xSize
          The amount of pixels in the x-dimension.
        • xWidth
          int xWidth
          xSize divided by pixelSize.
          See Also:
          LifePanel.xSize, LifePanel.pixelSize
        • yHeight
          int yHeight
          ySize divided by pixelSize.
          See Also:
          LifePanel.ySize, LifePanel.pixelSize
        • ySize
          int ySize
          The amount of pixels in the y-dimension.

    • Class visualisingCellularAutomata.MainClass extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      6750773676820411760L

      • Serialized Fields

        • contentPane
          javax.swing.JPanel contentPane
          The master panel that is the parent of all other panels and objects. First child of the JFrame.
        • playState
          int playState
          A local save for whether or not the simulation is running.
